ygData.subject: Lay Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: This one s just WAY too powerful...ain t gonna happen  :) ... From: Lim Dul [mailto:sevendegrees@hotmail.com] Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 3:01 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
This one's just WAY too powerful...ain't gonna happen :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Lim Dul [mailto:sevendegrees@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 3:01 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] suggestions to Verant


From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>

Hey you know, that isn't a bad idea. It would add a unique ability to our
class. :)

-- Lim'Dul

> Here's an idea I've been kicking around with my friends lately, >what
>about a
>"Lay Mana" skill where we can fully or partially regen all of our >mana
>once per
>day like the paladins can? This would go a long way to making >soloing a
>more
